## removeScope() function

Remove the scope prefix for the package name 去除包名的 scope 前缀

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function removeScope(pkgName: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pkgName | string | name of the package 包的名字 |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

string Return the name after removing the scope prefix 返回去除 scope 前缀后的名字
